addr: 301 Park Avenue. between 49-50th Streets. New York, NY 10022
title: Peacock Alley New Year's Eve Celebration at the Waldorf Astoria
desc: New Year?s Eve in New York City has a celebrated history at the Waldorf Astoria. We offer a twist on our famed Peacock Alley Buffet with a dinner fete of grand proportions, featuring Salmon, Black Cod, Pork Tenderloin and Short Ribs. Traditional dinner stations feature Leg of Lamb, Prime Rib and Bone in Ham and many more, alongside a Raw Bar of Fresh Lobster, Oysters and a selection of Caviars.  After dinner, the festivities continue with premium open bar service as the live band kicks off, making this year?s celebration the perfect New York Experience, right in the heart of our stunning lobby! ? Celebrating as a group? ?Reserve your table for up to 12 guests for a festive celebration with friends and family. Reservation options include the following:: DINNER & DANCING: Dinner seating at 10:00PM featuring live band and dancing. Band begins at 10:00PM and continues through 1:30AM with party favors and live telecast of the ball drop in Times Square.
